contentMeta.title: Tintle, Introduction to Statistical Investigations, First Edition
contentMeta.author: Nathan Tintle, Beth L Chance, George W Cobb, Allan J Rossman, Soma Roy, Todd Swanson, Jill VanderStoep

resourceList.title: P.1 Introduction to the Six‐Step Method

Video P.2.4: Compare variability between two or more distributions displayed in dotplots
